title: Define System Requirements for SmartGridCyberSecurity
description: Outline the essential system requirements to ensure secure and effective smart grid cybersecurity protection.

title: Design Cybersecurity Architecture for Smart Grid
description: Develop a comprehensive cybersecurity architecture to safeguard smart grid systems.

title: Create User Interface Design for Cybersecurity Dashboard
description: Design an intuitive and secure user interface for monitoring the smart grid cybersecurity system.
dependencies: Design Cybersecurity Architecture for Smart Grid

title: Develop Backend Services for Smart Grid Cybersecurity System
description: Build backend services to support the smart grid cybersecurity system functionalities.
dependencies: Design Cybersecurity Architecture for Smart Grid

title: Implement Database Structure for Cybersecurity System
description: Design and implement the database structure to store smart grid cybersecurity data.
dependencies: Design Cybersecurity Architecture for Smart Grid

title: Configure DevOps Pipeline for Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up the DevOps pipeline to ensure smooth integration, testing, and deployment of the smart grid cybersecurity system.
dependencies: Design Cybersecurity Architecture for Smart Grid

title: Perform Security Audit of the Smart Grid System
description: Thoroughly audit the smart grid system to identify and address potential cybersecurity vulnerabilities.
dependencies: Design Cybersecurity Architecture for Smart Grid

title: Write Technical Documentation for SmartGridCyberSecurity
description: Create comprehensive documentation detailing the design, implementation, and operation of the smart grid cybersecurity system. Include sections on architecture, security measures, installation, maintenance, and troubleshooting.
dependencies: Design Cybersecurity Architecture for Smart Grid
